recipe.title: Feel-Good Chicken Soup
ingredients: 1 quantity shredded Asian-Style Poached Chicken (see basic recipe), heated through
instructions: Place the stock, ginger, and soy sauce in a large saucepan over high heat and bring to the boil. Add the gai lan and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Divide the chicken, onion and chile between serving bowls and ladle the broth and gai lan over to serve.
